content:
As the father of a Thomas-mad toddler, I enjoyed this [retrospective in the New Yorker](https://www.newyorker.com/culture/rabbit-holes/the-repressive-authoritarian-soul-of-thomas-the-tank-engine-and-friends), especially how it remembers the incredibly dark episode where the Fat Controller bricks up a rain-shy Henry in a tunnel:

> We shall take away your rails, and leave you here for always and always and always

![Bricked-up Henry](https://barryf.s3.amazonaws.com/bricked-up-henry.jpg)

Brutal.
